Key Match Events: LaMelo Ball recorded 34 points, 11 assists, and 8 rebounds to lead the Hornets to a 110-105 win over Houston.
Post-Match Reflections: LaMelo Ball expressed joy at being back on the court after dealing with ankle injuries.
First-year coach Charles Lee praised Ball's growth and impact on the team.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Charlotte Hornets trailed by as many as 18 points but rallied to win the game.
The game was Charlotte's opener on Wednesday night.
